txt.en: Servants of Sauron the Great,\n\nThe hour has come for our greatest triumph! The City of Stars has fallen, and our advance waits only on the darkness of dawn. Our force is vast and grows greater by the day. If you seek the spoils of victory and the favour of the Great Eye, you will travel at once to Osgiliath and rally with the Morgul-host. The Men of Gondor have lost all but the armour they bear, and so thin has it worn that none may stand in the path of our Host and live.
